welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zaouiet Sousse, Tunisia! Nestled on the edge of the Mediterranean Sea, this charming city is known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zaouiet Sousse has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Habib Bourguiba Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
